description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal attacks (also known as Directory Traversal). This vulnerability is due to the lack of proper sanitization of user-supplied input in the 'path' variable. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted request with '..' sequences to navigate through the file system and access sensitive files. This vulnerability is classified as CWE-22 (Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')).
